item.description:
A lot of local performers will be doing short sets of their music all evening.
I will be singing 2 Gordon Lightfoot songs, accompanied on guitar by Ellis Ralph of Lawrence, MA, who will also be doing his own set.

The $5 admission goes to benefit the Nashua Soup Kitchen and Shelters.
There will also be snacks and beverages available; donations accepted.

The event is hosted by Doug Philbrook, who is a blues performer.
This is sponsored by Simple Gifts Coffee House at the Nashua Unitarian Universalist Church.

See http://www.uunashua.o... .
See http://www.uunashua.o... for directions.
item.why: If you have never heard me sing before, here is your chance.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Annual Local Performer Showcase
